attributes.action: Make Rememberance Day a National Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are heroes, men & women, past & present, should be remembered with the upmost respect they deserve from the current population.

Sadly, this is not recognised throughout the country in a way it deserves.

I agree, the Rememberance ceromany in Whitehall is very true and apt, but a National Holiday would further highlight and give the respect to our people who gave thire lives in the past and serve our Queen & Country today and in the future.

Please, lets all remember them with a day for they give their whole for us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
